scenario_text.value:
About time to invade the enemy base. Feels
like the last boss in a game, dontcha think?

This is no time for humorous anecdotes,
Minoru.

Who’s laughing?! If anything, I’m getting
crazy pumped-up, here!
Haha, I’d expect nothing less of you.
I ain’t scared. C’mon, let’s hurry on ahead!
